entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0198.10652] The filer has reported a value for the concept us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationStateAndLocalIncomeTaxes with a value of 0.064. This value should be calculated by taking the value of us-gaap:IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalIncomeTaxes with a value of -2,300,000 divided by the value of net income before tax of -18,907,000. This equals 0.1216 (rounded 4d). Please provide the equivalent percentage amount for this concept of 0.064. The value for net income should be calculated as the value of IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit divided by the value of EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperations.
The properties of this us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationStateAndLocalIncomeTaxes fact are: Period :2022-01-02 to 2022-12-31 Decimals : 3 Dimensions : Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:10652 Rule version: 26.0.0 - bgs-20221231x10k.htm 65
